content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: The accounts on each need to be IMAP. If one is POP and the other is IMAP, it cannot be done. Also, you cannot change an account from POP to IMAP, but must set up a new account.
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks for your answer. Both accounts are POP. In fact it's the exact same account. Surely I should be able to synchronize the Sent folder on both devices? Thanks for any further help.
creator: shardstrat

content: No. The sent folder is separate for each. Cannot be done.
creator: davidsk

content: POP is only for receiving e-mail. To send you probably use SMTP. SMTP typically doesn't cause the e-mail to appear in the remote server. Regardless, it's abnormal to make e-mail available to POP server that was sent through SMTP.
creator: brunoais

content: To clarify, SMTP is only for sending and is not related to POP or IMAP.

content:
kent.lennartsson said
Is it possible to regain the emails from 2008 to 2023 by some means. I guess that it could be possible by adding some backup if thunderbird lost them.

Yes. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-export - if you have less than 2gb
creator: wsmwk

content: The first question was, why thunderbird have deleted most emails between 2008 and 2023. To restore emails do not help very much if thunderbird will later delete them.
creator: kent.lennartsson

content:
kent.lennartsson said
The first question was, why thunderbird have deleted most emails between 2008 and 2023.

Is each year's data saved in a different folder? (that would probably be best) Do any have retention values set in Properties > Retention Settings?

After the fact, typically impossible to say why it was lost, much less will it happen again in the future. But losses of this type and magnitude tend to be something on the local computer - anvirus SW, bad disk, etc. In those cases, typically an entire folder of messages is lost.

Check https://mzl.la/4jo2vJ2 to see if any are a solid match.
creator: wsmwk

content: This seems to be the easiest way: - click help>troubleshootinginformation - scroll down to 'profile folder' and click 'open folder - back up one folder - you are now at .. appdata\roaming\thunderbird\profiles\<profile name> - exit thunderbird now (VERY IMPORTANT) - copy the profile to external media - start thunderbird on linux - click tools>import>import from another thunderbird installation - click 'choose a profile folder' - select your exported proflle and install
creator: davidsk

content: You need to tell us the history of this, such as new computer or new email address and whether POP or IMAP.
creator: davidsk

content:
Je možné, že ten priečinok je už preplnený. Thunderbirdom je stanovený maximálny objem 4GB (rovnako ako aj pre každý samostatný priečinok). Kliknite na ten priečinok pravým tlačidlom myši, vyberte "Vlastnosti" a preverte akú veľkosť na disku zaberá. Limit veľkosti zložky je detailnejšie vysvetlený tuná: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Limits_%28Thunderbird%29#Folders_and_messages.

Odporúčam staré správy z tohoto preplneného priečinka odstrániť, alebo archivovať.
